description: This file contains unit tests for the Tetris game engine, verifying deterministic RNG, game initialization, piece movement, rotation, hard drop, line clearing, and hold behavior.

classes.name: GameEngineUnitTest
classes.description: A suite of unit tests for the Tetris game engine, including tests for RNG, initialization, movement, rotation, hard drop, line clear, and hold features.

methods.name: sevenBag_isDeterministic
methods.description: Tests that the SevenBagRNG produces the same sequence when initialized with the same seed, ensuring deterministic RNG behavior.

methods.name: engine_initializesWithActivePiece
methods.description: Verifies that the Tetris engine initializes correctly with an active piece and proper game parameters.

methods.name: movement_leftRight_noCollision_changesXWhenPossible
methods.description: Checks that moving left or right updates the active piece's horizontal position when no collision occurs.

methods.name: rotation_attempt_appliesSRSOrStays
methods.description: Ensures that rotating the active piece applies the SRS (Super Rotation System) or the rotation stays if not possible.

methods.name: hardDrop_locksAndSpawnsNewPiece
methods.description: Tests that hard dropping a piece locks it, updates score accordingly, and spawns a new active piece centered at the top.

methods.name: lineClear_scoresAndLevels
methods.description: Validates that line clears update the score, level, and total lines, and the game remains stable after multiple drops.

methods.name: hold_swapsPieces_andPreventsConsecutiveHold
methods.description: Checks the hold feature, ensuring it swaps the current piece with the held piece and prevents consecutive holds without locking.
